Description: * {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Stamina increased from 2 to 3
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Stamina regeneration cooldown increased from 4.55s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Bebop}} Health per boon increased from +46 to +52
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} base damage reduced from 100 to 75
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T2 damage reduced from 63 to 60
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} Spirit Scaling increased from 1.1 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} per hero hit from 1.5% to 1% + 0.0025% Spirit Scaling
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} per hero kill from 4% to 2.5% + 0.015% Spirit Scaling
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Rain of Arrows}} cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Rain of Arrows}} T3 now also grants +30% Bullet Evasion
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} duration increased from 16s to 18s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} T1 damage increased from +81 to +85
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} Spirit Power per kill increased from 5 to 8
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} cooldown reduced from 32s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Fixed Lasso being removed by {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} Replicated Healing increased from 25% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} Replicated Healing now scales with boons (0.5)
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} ally damage penalty reduced from -30% to -20%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frost Grenade}} T3 now also reduces stamina regen by -30%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} T3 Max Spirit Power increased from 55 to 75
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} T3 Spirit Power linger duration increased from 6s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} initial knockup vertical area detection improved
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} now deals a fixed 40 damage
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} can now be casted while {{PageRef|Burrow}}ed
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} T2 increased from -19s Cooldown to -23s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} T3 now also slows dash distance by 40%
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} cooldown reduced from 30s to 27s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Time Wall}} Width increased from 7m to 7.5m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} T3 increased from +1m to +1.5m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Power Surge}} T2 reduced from -15% Spirit Resist for 8s to -10% for 6s
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} DPS increased from 90 to 95
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} T3 increased from +54 DPS to 65
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} T3 move speed increased from 2.5 to 3.8
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Spirit power growth increased from 1.1 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} initial velocity reduced from 1000 to 800
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} now only snaps to heroes
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} max duration increased from 3s to 4s (max damage is still at 2s)
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} now shows the target to redirect to (similar to {{PageRef|Wraith}}'s Cards)
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} cooldown reduced from 30s to 26s
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} radius increased from 6m to 6.5m
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Power Slash}} T3 bonus damage reduced from +166 to +150
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Power Slash}} T3 now also increases spirit power scaling by 0.5
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} heal on kill increased from 12% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 6.79 to 6.3
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Ammo reduced from 10 to 9
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Bullet Falloff from 58m to 52m
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} radius spirit scaling reduced from 0.0456 to 0.03
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.11 to 0.05
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} T3 reduced from 3% Max Health to 2.5%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Heavy Barrage}} T1 slow increased from 30% to 40% (and 20% dash slow)
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Heavy Barrage}} T3 spirit scaling increased from +0.1 to +0.2
* {{PageRef|Toxic Bullets}}: Bleed damage reduced from 2.2% to 2%
* {{PageRef|Toxic Bullets}}: Buildup is 10% harder
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Stamina regeneration cooldown improved from 6s to 5.5s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} stacks now count for half for each stack after a certain threshold (100 on hit and 10 on kill)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} base damage increased from 70 to 80
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T2 increased from +60 to +70
